trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked ask [Enter a number:] and wait set [number1 v] to (answer) forever ask (join [Enter a number to check if it's a divisor of the number ] (number1)) and wait set [number2 v] to (answer) if <((number1) mod (number2)) = [0]> then say (join (join (number2) [ is a divisor of the number ]) (number1)) for (3) secs else say (join (join (number2) [ is not a divisor of the number ]) (number1)) for (3) secs end end
